meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>fasten</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to fasten</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to tie up</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to tie together</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You are fastening up the <reading>coocoo</reading> (くく) clock, so the coocoo bird doesn't come out anymore. That annoying coocoo bird.
